content:
Forge 25.1 has just been released and is now available via https://simplifier.net/forge or auto-update!
The new Forge improves the retention of manually added meta-extensions on StructureDefinition and has a more fine-grained FHIR technical correction handling.
For a full list of fixes, please see Forge's own readme file (shown after install or update). For known issues, please check: https://simplifier.net/docs/forge/knownissues. For questions and feedback, please reach out at forge@fire.ly.
